mapper.sql: coach_Id, no, name, nick_name, age, tel, height, weight, birthday, sex, icon, score, comment, type,introduction
mapper.select: select distinct mem_Id from member_course where course_id in (select course_id from course where coach_id=#{coachId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select distinct a.* from coach a ,course b where a.coach_id=b.coach_id and b.club_id = #{coachId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into coach (coach_Id, no, name, nick_name, age, tel, height, weight, birthday, sex, icon, score, comment, type,introduction) values (#{coachId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{height,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=REAL}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update coach
no = #{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=TINYINT},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
height = #{height,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
score = #{score,jdbcType=REAL},
comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
introduction = #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where coach_Id = #{coachId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
